name: Abyss Surges
description: Designed after ginkgo leaves, these gauntlets are sturdy and unadorned. Made from durable material, they offer exceptional protection while dealing significant damage, making them a formidable weapon that excels in defense and offense.
effect: Energy Regen is increased by a percentage. When Resonance Skill hits a target, Basic Attack Damage is increased by a percentage lasting for 8s. when Basic Attack hits a target, Resonance Skill Damage is increased by a percentage lasting for 8s.
